longDescription: This platform was created to promote tourism in Kerala by highlighting both its world-famous and its lesser-known destinations. It's a comprehensive guide that provides travelers with rich, curated information, including historical context, the best times to visit, local tips, and stunning photo galleries. The goal is to help tourists go beyond the typical travel itineraries and discover the diverse, authentic beauty of Kerala, from its serene backwaters and lush hill stations to its historic temples and vibrant cultural festivals.
